title: Grindr is testing a premium AI tier with prices up to $499 a month
full_text: Grindr is testing a premium AI tier with prices up to $499 a month. Test prices for Grindr's AI subscription tier, "Edge," range from $80 to $220 a week — far more expensive than top offerings from Tinder and Hinge.. Want to use Grindr's AI products? You might have to cough up almost $500 a month. Grindr is in early testing for a new, higher-priced subscription tier called "Edge," the company confirmed to Busine… [+1753 chars]
